basics.name: Todd Miller
basics.label: Sr Systems Software Engineer
summary: Hello! I'm Todd, a web developer with a passion for creating tools and solutions that simplify and enhance everyday tasks. I greatly enjoy continuous learning and am always exploring strategies and technologies to refine my skills and expand my toolkit.

When I’m not coding, I enjoy spending time with my wife and two dogs, skateboarding, reading, and diving into board games of all varieties. These hobbies inspire my creativity and enhance my problem-solving skills. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to meaningful projects and collaborate with others who share my vision for a more efficient world.

work.name: Bridgestone Americas Technology Center
work.summary: Worked on internal engineering platform and HPC infrastructure. Helped migrate portions of the platform to AWS, led systems decoupling effort to protect the future health and integrity of the platform
highlights: Created a new, easily adoptable, easily tested methodology for graphics rendering on the client
Created and implemented a global strategy for continual integration & upgrading
responsibilities: Led platform CI/CD migration to AWS to increase throughput by re-architecting docker image creation, rewriting CI/CD pipelines, and rolling out to international development team.

Crafted detailed proposals that outlined operational cost, risk, and schedule impacts to inform and advise senior technical and non-technical staff on critical platform decisions, helping to ensure project alignment with business objectives.

Designed and developed large-scale features that enhanced core application functionality and responsiveness, driving innovation and enabling agile adaptation to evolving engineering demands and ultimately improving customer satisfaction.
Re-engineered client graphics system to simplify platform maintenance with a test-forwards approach, accelerating the delivery of new complex features with a high degree of quality.

Mentored & collaborated with other developers to help foster a high-performance, team culture through paired programming, code design reviews, and in-depth pull request reviews which led to faster onboarding processes, improved team productivity, and a strong quality-first culture.

Decreased labor costs and enshrined core business IP & data by translating brittle legacy scripts and unstructured file-based data storage into a robust, structured and well documented, globally-applicable platform feature.

Developed, pitched, and secured funding for an expert system to empower users to perform quarterly platform “rule updates”. Proposed system is projected to reduce development and maintenance costs by 80% and lead to 100x quicker rule generation
Created several microservices and proof of concepts to illuminate new solutions and drive progress
achievements: Created and implemented a global Platform upgrade strategy after 2yrs of failed effort.

work.name: Landi Industries
work.summary: First Staff-level position at a fast paced startup where I had a major voice in every technical software decision
highlights: Served as Technical and Team Lead, overseeing a team of six developers. Distilled technical requirements, planned stories, scoped sprints and helped accomplish sprint goals.
responsibilities: Communicated roadblocks, technical achievements, best practices and “philosophy of approach” to clients to facilitate good trust and transparency of work.

Raised concerns over client platform’s security vulnerabilities which resulted in an outside pentest confirming the vulnerabilities and prioritizing  the re-engineering of the platform’s JWT authentication scheme to leverage Microsoft’s Authentication Library (MSAL). This process mitigated substantial risks to sensitive data and facilitated deeper trust with our client.

Attacked client’s growing technical debt and need for extensive refactors to enable new features by implementing the first end-to-end tests for a legacy, multi-client platform. E2e tests provided essential coverage that facilitated large-scale refactors while ensuring system stability.

Conducted business critical technical spikes and evaluations of tooling and frameworks to reduce development costs and refine the project direction and timeline, leading to an optimized schedule and more accurate cost of delivery.

Created UML and system architecture diagrams that enhanced communication between clients and the team, serving as crucial foundational documentation for onboarding new developers. This initiative improved knowledge transfer and reduced onboarding time, increasing team velocity and quality
achievements: Mentored developers, instilling best practices that focused on  the development of easily tested, low-maintenance features, which not only met high-quality standards but also reduced time spent on rework, thereby enhancing overall efficiency.

work.name: Bridgestone Americas Technology Center
work.summary: Made major contributions to a growing engineering platform that would later facilitate the design of every tire for a +20-billion dollar revenue tire company
responsibilities: Designed and coordinated the implementation of large-scale features across a multi-national team, ensuring seamless collaboration and project success.

Contributed to the optimization and expansion of a robust geometry engine (ex. vectorization of Cardano's method for intersections between Bezier curves and straight lines for a 100x speed improvement.)

Developed and tested half-edge algorithms to 'clip', 'fill', and manipulate geometry for more accurate virtual tire modeling. This allowed for more robust creation & analysis of virtual tires saving schedule and material waste by reducing the number of physical molds needed for developing a new tire.
Developed initial React unit tests for a newly adopted framework, improving code reliability and maintainability.
Prepared and delivered technical presentations to minimize system maintenance costs and enhanced training for peers.

work.name: Kenda American Technical Center
responsibilities: Planned, developed, tested and deployed full stack environment for automated and assisted engineering analysis using MySQL, Python/Django/DRF, Node/AngularJS/Angular
Designed, implemented, documented a RESTful API for future and current integration with CATIA, and other internal applications
Automated and improved upon the analysis of test results for development engineers
Mentored other team members with regards to program architecture and 'pythonic' philosophy
highlights: Threw out the first pitch at a professional baseball game in Taiwan

responsibilities: Responsible for Linear Dynamics Methodology development, management, planning, and improvements
Recommended and executed plans to improve development tools and processes
highlights: Increased department efficiency by writing several pre & post-processing tools in Python

work.name: Honda R&D Americas
work.summary: Ensured that developed vehicles met targets for Noise and Vibration and passed all regulatory tests
responsibilities: Planned, scheduled and coordinated detailed phases of large-scale projects
Assessed & adapted prototype model performance with respect to noise and vibration
Simulation-driven design of intake and exhaust systems that were then prototyped, tuned and tested
highlights: Created an educational attenuation rig where visiting students could learn about sound and how intakes and exhausts are designed.
